data.title: "Karma", An Indie Wave You Don't Wanna Miss - Rap Fiesta
data.meta_description: Be sure to stream Geena Duffy new song ‘Karma’; on all streaming platforms now. The coverage for Geena Duffy latest single can be found here.
data.text:
Geena Duffy and her latest single, “Karma“, lay down an indie-inspired vibe that we’re more than confident you’re going to love. The Boston singer wrote and produced the wavy song, highlighting the extent of Geena Duffy’s incredible talents and natural feel for creating top-notch music.

“Karma” gets straight to the point, expressing the fact that what goes around comes around, which can be particularly frustrating for those who put out bad energy.

What goes around comes back, baby I can promise you,” – Geena Duffy.

The Boston vocalist was inspired to create “Karma” after watching someone who had done her wrong experience their bad karma. The singer decided to personify karma for the song, making it all the more catchy and relatable.

I had a period recently where someone who always brought me down ended up in a position they originally shamed me for being in, – Geena Duffy, regarding the inspiration behind ‘Karma.’

The beat featured in “Karma,” produced by Geena Duffy herself, is an ear-catching blend of indie-inspired elements. A funky bass captures your attention throughout the entire song. And the addicting melodic elements only make things better.

Because the artist produced the beat for the song herself, the pitches and movements align with her vocals and the way her verses flow perfectly. Geena Duffy’s voice is one of a kind, and trust us when we say you’ll experience this in “Karma.” The vocalist can go from high-pitched vocal runs to laying down in-your-face flows within moments.

These shifts make “Karma” and Geena Duffy all the more enticing, leaving us wondering what type of sound her next project will carry.

If one thing’s for certain regarding Geena Duffy’s music career, it’s that she’s confident in what she’s doing and the unique sound she pours into every song. This polished experience can be credited to the singer’s extensive time in the music industry.

Since 2016, Geena Duffy has been releasing singles and various projects. To date, she has three EPs and an album on her discography. Therefore, all this experience has allowed Geena Duffy to find and create a sound that’s 100% unique to her style.

Karma got you bad / she took everything you had,” – Geena Duffy.

Make sure you give Geena Duffy a follow on Instagram because the singer has a lot in store for her fans. That said, you can expect an upcoming EP entitled “Phases of the Sun” from Geena Duffy this summer. And based on how hard “Karma” hits, we’re excited to see what she brings to the table next!

Don’t waste another moment; stream “Karma” by Geena Duffy as soon as possible! You won’t regret it!
